name: internal
content:
internal adjective
(INSIDE PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 inside the body: He sustained injuries to his arms, legs, and several internal organs.
inside a person's mind: The internal struggle with his conscience continued. She didn't want to be left alone with her dark internal thoughts.
More examplesFewer examplesProlonged use of the drug can cause internal bleeding.The police have disclosed that two officers are under internal investigation.The internal logic of her argument is undeniable.A series of internal struggles was the prologue to full-scale civil war.
